cards.title: 简介
cards.body: 一个用于构建 API 的现代、快速（高性能）的 web 框架，使用 Python 3.6+ 并基于标准的 Python 类型提示

cards.title: 安装 FastAPI
cards.code: $ pip install "fastapi[all]"

cards.title: 安装 FastAPI
cards.body: 假如你想将应用程序部署到生产环境，你可能要执行以下操作：

cards.title: 安装 FastAPI
cards.code: $ pip install fastapi

cards.title: 安装 FastAPI
cards.body: 并且安装 `uvicorn` 来作为服务器：

cards.title: 安装 FastAPI
cards.code: $ pip install "uvicorn[standard]"

cards.title: 安装 FastAPI
cards.code: $ uvicorn main:app --reload

cards.title: 最小程序
cards.body: 下面代码会直接启动http服务，也可以使用 `uvicorn main:app --reload`

from pydantic import BaseModel
from typing import Union

class Item(BaseModel):
    name: str = '小明'
    description: Union[str, None] = None
    price: float
    tax: Union[float, None] = None

@app.post("/items/")
async def create_item(item: Item):
    print(item.name)
    return item

cards.title: 表单数据
文件上传
cards.code:
from fastapi import FastAPI, UploadFile
from fastapi.responses import HTMLResponse

@app.post("/uploadfile/")
async def create_upload_file(file: UploadFile):
    print(file.file.read().decode())
    return {"filenames": file.filename, "type": str(type(file.file))}

@app.get("/")
async def main():
    content = """<body>
<form action="/uploadfile/" enctype="multipart/form-data" method="post">
<input name="file" type="file" multiple>
<input type="submit">
</form>
</body>"""
    return HTMLResponse(content=content)

类作为依赖项
cards.code:
from typing import Union
from fastapi import Depends, FastAPI

app = FastAPI()
fake_items_db = [{"item_name": "Foo"}, {"item_name": "Bar"}]

class CommonQueryParams:
    def __init__(
        self, 
        q: Union[str, None] = None, 
        skip: int = 0, 
        limit: int = 100
    ):
        self.q = q
        self.skip = skip
        self.limit = limit

全局依赖项
cards.code:
from fastapi import Depends, FastAPI, Header, HTTPException

async def verify_token(x_token: str = Header()):
  if x_token != "fake-super-secret-token":
    raise HTTPException(status_code=400, detail="X-Token 标头无效")

async def verify_key(x_key: str = Header()):
  if x_key != "fake-super-secret-key":
    raise HTTPException(status_code=400, detail="X-Key 标头无效")
  return x_key

cards.title: HTTPS 和证书
cards.body: 在生产环境中，你应该使用一个真正的证书和私钥，你可以从像 Let's Encrypt 这样的证书颁发机构获得免费的证书，或者使用 OpenSSL 生成自签名证书

cards.title: HTTPS 和证书
HTTPS 和证书
cards.body: 启动服务器时，使用以下命令来指定证书和私钥：

cards.title: HTTPS 和证书
cards.code: uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 443 --ssl-keyfile /path/to/your/key.pem --ssl-certfile /path/to/your/cert.pem

cards.title: HTTPS 和证书
cards.body: FastAPI 默认支持 HTTPS，你只需要提供证书和私钥即可。
